text: Zaeef (old) aur beemar log aur woh log jo shirkat e jihad ke liye raah nahin paatey, agar peechey reh jayein to koi harj nahin jabke woh khuloos e dil ke saath Allah aur uske Rasool ke wafadaar hon. Aisey mohsineen par aitraz ki koi gunjaish nahin hai aur Allah darguzar karne wala aur reham farmane wala hai
